title: Help on Free PBE
body: Hey are there someone there know a problem there happens when i have downloadet PBE then its updating up in the corner but every time its goes on 17 procent then there says i at least have to have 8 GB free on my computer but i have 1,65 TB on my computer so if anyone know how to fix it pls write so i can fix it

replies.body: If it's saying there's not enough free space, you most likely need to delete something to make room for the PBE client. If there's already enough space, take a screenshot showing me your current hard drive space and the error you're seeing and post it here for me to see.
